sentence: For years in radio show appearances, motivational speeches, and campaign events, Georgia GOP Senate candidate Herschel Walker said he'd graduated as valedictorian of his class at the University of Georgia.
author: Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert
title: For years, Georgia GOP Senate candidate Herschel Walker claimed he'd graduated in the top 1% of his class at University of Georgia  but he never graduated at all

sentence: Tuesdays debate among Georgia Republican Senate candidates was predictably defined by the man who wasnt there Herschel Walker.
title: Georgia GOP Senate debate focuses on Herschel Walker absence

sentence: Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas met with Senate candidate Herschel Walker in his first quasi-public appearance since he was discharged from the hospital last month.
author: Kaelan Deese
title: Justice Clarence Thomas meets with Georgia GOP Senate hopeful Herschel Walker

sentence: Democratic Senator Raphael Warnock looks as if he's headed for a tough race to defend his Georgia seat against GOP contender Herschel Walker in November's midterm.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Raphael Warnock's Chances of Beating Herschel Walker, According to Polls

sentence: The crowd barked their Georgia Bulldog approval as Herschel Walker bounded to the podium at a recent rally for former President Donald Trump.
author: Shannon McCaffrey
title: Will transgender sports rally conservative voters? Georgia GOP is banking on it

sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker questioned the existence of evolution this week in an appearance at a Georgia church.
title: Georgia GOP Senate candidate Herschel Walker questions evolution

sentence: Meanwhile, Trump's chosen candidate Herschel Walker has proven to be just as big of a disaster.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: How the Republican Party's deal with Trump is leading to chaos in Georgia GOP elections

sentence: Following a campaign event on Wednesday, Georgia GOP candidate for Senate Herschel Walker said he supports a total abortion ban with no exception for rape, incest, or the health of the mother.
author: Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert
title: Trump-endorsed Senate candidate Herschel Walker supports a total abortion ban: 'there's no exception in my mind'

sentence: Former football star Herschel Walker has a huge lead in polling over opponents looking to take on Mr. Warnock in Georgia, while former White House press secretary Sarah Sanders is expected to easily win the GOP nomination for governor in Arkansas, a state her father, Mike Huckabee, previously led.
author: Cameron McWhirter
title: Georgia GOP Primary Elections for Governor and Secretary of State Are Top Contests Today

sentence: His preferred Senate candidate in Georgia, Herschel Walker, easily won the GOP nomination despite warnings from Walker's Republican competitors about his history of domestic violence and mental health struggles.
author: STEVE PEOPLES and JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Kemp wins Georgia GOP gov's race in stinging rebuke of Trump

sentence: His preferred Senate candidate in Georgia, Herschel Walker, easily won the GOP nomination despite warnings from Walker's Republican competitors about his history of domestic violence and mental health struggles.
author: STEVE PEOPLES and JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Trump rebuked with stinging losses in Georgia GOP contests
